briefTitle: PECBLOCK for the Treatment of Pain After Breast Surgery
officialTitle: The Pectoral Nerve Block (PECBLOCK) for the Treatment of Pain After Breast Cancer Surgery.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Pain score at rest in the recovery room
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* women aged 18-85 yrs old
* patients ASA status I-IV

Exclusion Criteria:

* refusal of the PECBLOCK
* allergy to a drug used in the protocol (local anesthetic)
* patients with chronic pain before the surgery
